nodes.text: An unidentified power droid was one of the Death Watch junk droids located within the Carlac Death Watch camp and blasted for target practice.
Sometime before 20 BBY, the power droid was captured by Death Watch, a Mandalorian terrorist organization, and brought to Carlac.

After Jedi Padawan Ahsoka Tano rescued senator Lux Bonteri from the Separatists on Mandalore, they left the Confederate–Republic peace conference with astromech droid R2-D2. Bonteri then brought them all to the Death Watch on Carlac where R2 was ordered by a soldier to repair the damaged junk droids at the camp which included a power droid.
